meta.title: From ANDREW to BIRD
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: I first saw [Andrew Bird](https://www.andrewbird.net/) perform in the basement of a frat house when we were both in college at Northwestern, when I (probably) said, "This kid's going places." Hard to pick my favorite Andrew Bird song, but I suppose it'd have to be the [one with lyrics that sound like palindromes](https://genius.com/Andrew-bird-fake-palindromes-lyrics).
